name: EMTECH SOLUTIONS INC.
description: Developer of cloud-based software designed to provide central banks with scalable and resilient digital infrastructure. The company offers digital regulatory sandboxes for multi-party collaborative workflows, digital cash, and digital currency integrators for cross-border integration among others, enabling central banks to modernize operations and improve efficiency.
one_liner: Developer of cloud-based software designed to provide central banks with scalable and resilient digital infrastructure. The company offers digital regulatory sandboxes for multi-party collaborative workflows, digital cash, and digital currency integrators for cross-border integration among others, enabling central banks to modernize operations and improve efficiency.
